alert.note: Alert for Coweta (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 6:17PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Shoal Creek near Sharpsburg affecting Coweta County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Shoal Creek near Sharpsburg. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM EST Thursday was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.5 feet on 02/19/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
